tool.name: squidpy
tool.command: ##read in tarred visium tar -zxf ${visium_data} -C visium_out --strip-components=1 && python scanpy.py --data visium_out ##PARAMS FOR PREPROCESSING && python squidpy.py --data scanpy_out ##PARAMS FOR SQUIDPY
tool.inputs: <param name="image" type="data" format="png" label="Image file" help="/> <param name="features"
